text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Where is the #USA ‘s PPE’s? Instead of posting about you shipping stuff out of the United States why don’t you tell the truth about nurses and Dr. still not having enough protective equipment on a daily basis! #IdiotInChief #liar #Coronavirus PPE
